name: EscapeVR: The Basement
description: You find yourself locked in the cell of an unknown basement with nothing else than a bed and a toilet. Can you escape? Explore the environment, solve puzzles, investigate clues, and find your way through a total of 7 rooms to -hopefully- escape the basement of this VR escape room game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 29 Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Best escape game around so far There is teleporting, but at this stage that isn't a big immersion breaker for me  Enough items to leave you questioning what is used and what is distraction  Just the right amount of challenge
Great experience! one of the first VR games I bought. My children also had fun with it. Only negative thing is that it's really short.... Looking foreward for to more escape rooms...
I mean, I do like this game! But theres not much.. I jusat wish there were some more elaberate puzzles and it was a little longer. But otherwise great game and please come out with some more escapes.
